posts.post_content:
High everyone got a chance to upgrade on this card so selling this copy.  Asking for $400.00.  Similar one just sold for this price on ebay.  Payment by paypal only please.  If interested please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks everyone

William
Moved to ebay auction.  Auction ends saturday night at 7:20pm
Super tough card. Took me a while to find mine. Good luck.
